reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that the app collects various types of information from users for operational purposes and research. It details the data collected and how it may be used, demonstrating a clear declaration of data collection.
reply.reference: We may utilize 'cookies' and 'web beacons' to enhance your experience and provide personalized services through Camus. ... we may collect various types of information from you, including personally identifiable information, billing and payment information, profile information, and log data. ... certain information you provide may be considered health-related data. URL: https://www.projectcamus.com/privacy.php

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects personally identifiable information, billing and payment information, profile information, log data, computer information, IP address, pages visited, actions taken, and health-related data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that the app may collect various types of information including personally identifiable information and other relevant statistics. The listed data types are extracted directly from the privacy policy text.
reply.reference: including personally identifiable information, billing and payment information, profile information, and log data. This information may include your name, phone number, email address, address, computer information, IP address, pages visited, actions taken, and other relevant statistics. Please note that certain information you provide may be considered health-related data. URL: https://www.projectcamus.com/privacy.php

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that the app declares the purpose of data collection and use, mentioning the specific intentions behind collecting user data.

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or request the deletion of data by contacting the provided contact information. The app ensures that user requests regarding data collection and deletion are addressed in compliance with applicable laws and regulations.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that users have rights and choices regarding the personal information collected by the app, including the ability to opt out of data collection or request data deletion.
reply.reference: If you wish to exercise any of these rights or have any questions regarding your privacy rights and choices, please contact us using the provided contact information. We will respond to your requests in accordance with applicable laws and regulations. URL: https://www.projectcamus.com/privacy.php

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: No, the app does not share data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app does not sell, rent, or share user content with any third parties, except as outlined in their Privacy Policy and as required by law. The employees and contractors are also bound by strict confidentiality obligations.
reply.reference: We do not sell, rent, or share your user content with any third parties, except as outlined in our Privacy Policy and as required by law. Our employees and contractors are bound by strict confidentiality obligations and are prohibited from accessing, reading, or sharing your user content without proper authorization. URL: https://www.projectcamus.com/privacy.php
